QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_TankBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Base quantities that are common to the definition of all types of tanks.

QtoDef.Name: GrossWeight
QtoDef.Definition: Weight of the element itself, not including contained fluid.

QtoDef.Name: NetWeight
QtoDef.Definition: Weight of the element, including contained fluid as designed.

QtoDef.Name: TotalSurfaceArea
QtoDef.Definition: Total surface area of the element.
